item.title: Tastrion
item.description:
About This Game

Somewhere in the vast unknown, a rogue planet drifts endlessly into space, once belonging to an advanced civilization that has now been consumed by Tastrion, an artificial mutagen that is the most potent genotoxin ever made. The last hope of humanity has been deployed from Ginsaria 9, a space colony that has developed a gunship titled ''Desolazor'' wielding a powerful weapon to fight back and eradicate the infestation before it spreads further across the galaxy...

Tastrion is a Shoot 'Em Up inspired by 90's classics such as Gradius, Arrow Flash, and Gleylancer. The weapon system is simplistic. 4 Buttons, 3 shots. Main frontal Photon lasers, multi-directional Ion spread, armor-piercing rail gun, and an all-powerful solar-powered radiant bomb. with the help of upgradable pickups across your missions, turn your weaponry and ship into the ultimate massacre machine.

The game includes:

- 6 Stages, 12 bosses, 5 secret rare power-up containers, and 1 secret super difficult stage.
- 1 Single-player game mode
- Weaponry upgradable up to 8 times.
- Dark-synth and industrial-themed music.

Tastrion is a modern take on 16-bit 90's era shmups with modern aspect ratio, it isn't entirely a bullet hell, but expect a challenge.

Notes:
- The trailer is not a complete representation of the final product, so expect enemy placements and details in stages may be slightly different on release.
- There will be some future updates after release and it will be added to the game.
- supports Xbox and Playstation controllers but mainly focused on Xbox users.

This game has been made with SHMUP Creator! A versatile tool for creating Shoot 'Em Up genres.
Kudos to the talented creators and the community!

item.title: Gloves On!
item.description:
About This Game

Gloves On! is a boxing experience with realistic controls and a unique perspective of fighting games. Step in the ring with a fighter created by you or chosen between multiple options and fight a full match of boxing packed with adrenaline and action.



Simple and straight to the point, the first official game release of Deep Cave Studios is not messing around and will push you to the limit. Practice and learn the boxing fundamentals with real and accurate movements and techniques. Fight against fighters controlled by CPU or by a real person with Local or Online PvP or practice your punches against the punching bag.

FEATURES:

  • Realistic Controls - Dynamic and Immersive controls to master
  • Training - Step into the Gloves On! Gym and master all the movements required to be a real fighter
  • Character Customization - Choose your equipment between 15+ types of shorts, gloves and headgear.
  • Local or Online PvP - Fight against people from all over the world or by connecting an extra controller
  • Multiplayer Ranking - Compete for a place in the global leaderboards

MULTIPLAYER:


Coming soon to the game, the multiplayer experience will include character customization and a competitive setting with weekly and monthly leaderboards so fighters will compete for first place. Make your own history and become the best fighter the world has ever seen.

item.title: Unreal Physics
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into the dynamic world of physics with Unreal Physics an immersive 3D physics sandbox and demo collection that pushes the boundaries of Unreal Engine. This unique experience combines the cutting-edge FluidNinja and Chaos physics systems to deliver a mesmerizing showcase of fluid dynamics, destruction, and realistic simulations.



Fluid Dynamics Unleashed: Witness the incredible power of FluidNinja as it brings fluid simulations to life in ways you've never imagined. Whether it's the graceful flow of water, the mesmerizing realism of smoke, or the viscous flowing of molten lava, the fluid dynamics in this sandbox will leave you in awe.



Chaos Physics on Display: Brace yourself for a revolution in destructible environments and realistic physics simulations with Unreal Engine's Chaos Physics. Experience the sheer thrill as structures crumble, debris scatters realistically, and chaos ensues in response to your every action. The level of destructibility will redefine your expectations of in-game physics.



Endless Possibilities in the Sandbox: Engage with a variety of physics-driven demos and sandbox environments that showcase the versatility of FluidNinja and Chaos Physics. From tinkering with fluid dynamics to unleashing controlled chaos, each demo invites you to explore, experiment, and marvel at the beauty of physics in action.



Visual Spectacle: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals that showcase the capabilities of Unreal Engine. From the realistic rendering of fluid surfaces to the intricate details of destructible objects, every frame is a testament to the technological prowess that FluidNinja and Chaos Physics bring to the gaming landscape.

Embark on a adventure into the realms of physics with Unreal Physics a playground for FluidNinja and Unreal Engine physics showcasing the possibilities of current physics systems. This sandbox experience isn't just a game – it's a showcase of innovation, creativity, and the awe-inspiring power of physics simulations

item.title: Tactic Boxing
item.description:
About This Game

Tactic Boxing is a hardcore boxing simulator with ragdoll physics, local multiplayer and a career mode.

- Local Multiplayer (a controller is required for local multiplayer)
- Active Ragdoll Physics
- 3 Boxing Styles: Puncher, Slugger, Out-Boxer
- 9 skills (strength, accuracy, health, stamina, footwork, attack speed, chin, HP and SP recovery)
- 40 boxers (not real)
- Career mode
- Mouse and keyboard controls
- Gamepad controls

item.title: .Forty-Five
item.description:
About This Game

A perfect mix of card game, rogue-lite, and pure wild west mayhem. Explore an ever-changing map, collect interesting cards, and battle enemies.

Explore and Collect
Explore the Frontier and add powerful cards - bullets - to your collection. Each one equipped with its own unique effect.



Build
Each bullet has an individual effect, used to create powerful synergies. Use them to build your deck and to become an Outlaw Legend!



Load and shoot to kill!
Load your cards into the revolver and use the effects to your advantage, while also utilizing the limited amount of chambers and the rotations of the revolver. Then, shoot the enemies and send them 6 feet deep! But watch out, he won't just stand there letting you shoot him down so easily…



Features
Completely free & Open Source: And thats a great price if you ask me. No ads or any kind of microtransactions, I promise. Read down below to find out more about the open-source licence that .forty-five is under.
Over 50 unique cards: some serious and some … a little bit … less serious.
Innovative gameplay: allowing the player to achieve creative combos with the revolvers rotation.
100% handdrawn assets: I might not be the next picasso, but hey, I'm trying okay …
A procedurally generated map: ever-changing, guaranteeing a new experience every run.
Deckbuilding: to truly personalize your way of … shooting people.
Different enemy types: so you'll never run out of things to shoot at.
Unique biomes: each … you know what just download and find out it's free.


We are open source!
The source code of .forty-five is public under the GPLv3 license. But what does that actually mean? It means that anyone is free to view and share the code of the game. Also, everyone can make their own modified versions of our game and redistribute it, as long as they maintain the GPLv3.0 license.

Want to know more? Read about the license here: https://choosealicense.com/licenses/gpl-3.0/

Want to take a look at our code? Visit our Github: https://github.com/blueUserRed/forty-five

Project Infos:
.Forty-Five is developed as a Diploma Thesis by five students of the higher technical vocational school "HTL Rennweg" in Vienna. We hope you will have as much fun playing, as we had developing.

item.title: Lunatic Taxi Driver
item.description:
About This Game

Lunatic Taxi Driver is an exciting and fast-paced game that puts you in the shoes of a taxi driver who is determined to show the world what it means to be a truly exceptional driver. Your goal in Lunatic Taxi Driver is to pick up passengers, transport them to their destination, and do it all with speed, efficiency, and style. But being a great taxi driver isn't just about speed and skill - it's also about customer service. In Lunatic Taxi Driver, you'll need to keep your car clean, well-maintained, and fully fueled at all times, while also being friendly, courteous, and professional with your passengers. Even if you break the rules of the road in your quest for speed, you'll always make sure that your passengers are safe and comfortable. Whether you're a seasoned driver or just looking for a fun and challenging simulation game, Lunatic Taxi Driver is sure to provide hours of thrilling entertainment. So why wait? Get behind the wheel and start driving today!

Game features:
  • 5 business taxis
  • 2 Game Modes ( City / Offroad)
  • 20 levels

item.title: Let's Park Bus Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Have you ever been challenged to measure your accuracy skills? Well, Let's Parking: Bus Edition comes with dozens of challenges.These will consist of all kinds of parking behind the wheel of a large bus. You will encounter all kinds of obstacles that will prevent you from performing a correct parking. As a result, you will be rewarded with stars that will once again demonstrate your professionalism in driving a massive engine. Stop thinking, show it to everyone who is the coolest in the parking lot,right now!

Game features:
  • More than 20 levels
  • 3 attempts in case you hit the bus
  • 2 types of buses with automatic transmission

item.title: Wild Animals Transporter
item.description:
About This Game

The world keeps changing. Unfortunately, not all things work out for the best. Some animals are endangered. As a driver, you will help transport these innocent creatures to be rescued from poaching. You will meet all kinds of species: rhinos, zebras, oxen that need a new home. Be careful how you drive, they are sensitive to it because they are wild. In this way you will also contribute to saving the lives of these wonderful creatures!

Game features:
  • More than 9 levels
  • Sharp Turns
  • Big trailer that holds these animals ( rhynos,zebras,oxen)

item.title: Megis Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

Description
"Megis Adventure" is an open - world RPG pixel game. You find yourself on an isolated, faraway island, and starts an adventure to overcome mysteries, foes and dungeons - all in hope to help the citizens of the island. The story is not complex, yet fun and full of surprises which leads to enjoyable and immersing gameplay experience.

History
"Megis Adventure" was developed by a solo developer in early 2023. The development is completely independent of everything, including capital. Which makes it 100% focused on pure fun gameplay and makes it the game the developer wants to make. The developer obligated to create an ad free and in-purchases free game with all future updates to be given free to anyone who purchase the game, with a commitment to never change that decision.

Features
- Available in 26 languages!
- Experience retro pixel art game with old-school and nostalgy game style!
- Explore lively open world, visit different buildings, NPC's, islands, zones, and more!
- Get in action by exploring dungeons, overcoming traps, monsters and bosses!
- Go for adventures, more than one hundred quests to complete!
- Choose your favorite play style by building your talents tree, out of twenty-seven different talents options!
- Strengthen your character by unlocking passive bonuses and progress in level, professions and equipment!
- Gather resources - chop wood, mine stone, fish more than one hundred unique fish!
- Hundreds of items and consumables to buy and trade, as you progress in level, new items are unlocked!
- Unlock friendly pet that will join you in your adventures!
- Pick your favorite class out of three classes: Swashbuckler, Beast Master and Sorcerer!
- Follow an engaging story with rich lore!
- Immerse into hand-designed fantasy world with warm sensibility of pixel art!

Start your epic adventure!
Hop into the pixel RPG open world of "Megis Adventure" today!

"Megis Adventure promises to bring the most exciting entertainment hours." - 2Game

"Megis Adventure: An RPG in the spirit of The Legend of Zelda." - App-Time

item.title: BLACK WEREWOLF
item.description:
About This Game

BLACK WEREWOLF - Werewolves from neighboring lands invaded your lands and began to destroy all your property. The village elder had no choice but to send you to deal with the enemies and find out what was going on. You need to be extremely careful and unnoticed to deal with enemies and return the stolen goods.

Explore mysterious forests, destroying enemy werewolves. In this dark game, your character must collect stolen items and uncover secrets to defeat ferocious enemies. On your way you will encounter different types of werewolves, each of which has its own unique abilities.

Game Features:
- Atmospheric gameplay with intense battles
- Various locations filled with dangers
- Various types of werewolves with unique attacks

item.title: Soul Eater
item.description:
About This Game

About this Game

"Soul Eater" is an exhilarating 2D platformer roguelike game that offers players a dynamic and constantly evolving gaming experience. With every playthrough, the game dynamically adjusts the positions of enemies and map layouts, guaranteeing that players face fresh challenges and surprises each time they engage with the game. Moreover, players have the option to randomly upgrade their skills, introducing an element of unpredictability and strategic decision-making to their gameplay.

Game Story

The player embarks on a journey through a sword containing the soul of a being desperate for revenge against their past betrayers. The soul within the sword shares the player's past wounds and anger, fueling a desire for vengeance against their enemies. As the player travels the world, they seek out those who betrayed them in the past, and with each encounter, they have the opportunity to seize their souls. These acquired souls are absorbed into the player, further empowering the player, and allowing player to control the enemy.

Controls

Move the character "W","A","S","D"
Throw the sword "R"
Interact with NPC "V"
Skill "Q"
Attack "Left Mouse Click"
Parrying "Drag while holding down the right mouse button"

Requirement

"Soul Eater" only work Window system

item.title: Move Ball to Green
item.description:
About This Game

Just draw anything. Make the ball move to the green zone!
It is a puzzle game that can be your best brain teaser.
MBG is also good for teaching physics science to your own baby.

- How to play
You can draw things by touching and dragging the screen. Your drawing will be dropping by gravity. Bump it to move the ball to the goal. Or you can make other construction as a tool to move the ball like ancient people.

item.title: LetMeOut
item.description:
About This Game

Bundy is a scholar with a long history.

You witness deep within him his research to cure his wife's dementia.

The research involves extracting all electrical signals from neurons in living people, and you may also be a victim.

You must escape from deep memories and solve various puzzles that he prepares to test others.

Escape by solving problems such as chess, which he enjoyed playing with his wife, complicated hospital facilities, and locked doors.

He must also run away from his wife's symptoms, the attacks from the test subjects, and his memories of the past.

Gameplay
Let Me Out is a game in which players must survive through five stages by finding items that can help them escape from each test subject. Solve puzzles, gimmicks, subject tracking, and more to survive and pass the final stage.

SYNOPSIS

Bundy studied dolls with artificial nerves to preserve memories for long periods of time.


He recruited outstanding scholars from various fields to the academy to treat his wife. And we tested whether they had developed memories and brains.

Let Me Out consists of a total of 5 stages and experiences various places in Bundy's memories.

There are also past images in the form of electrical signals.

You must retrieve your mind and memories through the countless puzzles and layers of memories he shared with Julia.

No, should I take it back?

Does it matter?

We must remember, in memory.

---------

Part of Bundy's research diary

Is the human subject the body? Is it mental?

If it is the mind, is it memory? Or is it something like a soul that creates thoughts?

If someone else can take it, will I be that person?

Dementia...isn't it about losing that...?

item.title: Crawlspace Multiplayer
item.description:
About This Game

A nightmarish playground awaits beneath the floorboards. Join forces with your friends to conquer the crawlspace and retrieve the baby dolls that are trapped in its depths. But watch your back... killer dolls thirst for your fear. In this suffocating battle for survival, teamwork is your only lifeline. Can you mend the ventilation system and escape, or will the crawlspace become your eternal tomb?

Maximum 4 players.

Features:
*Nights: Complete 5 challenging nights in the crawlspace.
*Unique dolls: Multiple dolls with different attacks to avoid.
*Motivating Messages: Enjoy motivating messages from your employer.
*Proximity Voice Chat: Talk with your friends sometimes.
*Multiplayer: Use teamwork to have fun with your friends. Or slap them.
*Singleplayer: If you have no friends.

Coming soon:
*New map with new dolls and gameplay.

item.title: Forest Keeper 2
item.description:
About This Game

Forest Keeper 2 is a continuation of the first part of the game! Plunge back into a little adventure with the forest guardian!

The Guardian of the Forest has called you again! This time a snowstorm has hit peaceful lands and only you can stop it! Solve puzzles with different cubes and go to the end. In the game you will find many unique blocks and levels that can be completed in different ways!

Game Features:
- Lots of levels
- Convenient controls
- Physics
- Colorful graphics

item.title: Magic Ring
item.description:
About This Game

Magic Ring is an exciting 3D game that takes you on a dangerous journey through the desert to take part in a legendary tournament! You have to fight various monsters and bosses using magical powers! Use your skills and tactics, fight, collect artifacts and become a legend of the desert tournament and win the main prize - a magic ring!

Peculiarities
- Colorful graphics.

- Great soundtrack.

item.title: Getaway Driver
item.description:
About This Game

INFO

Take on the role of a former bank robbing getaway driver as you explore a fully realized city. Cruise through bustling downtown streets, beaches, deserts and more in a handful of vehicles including sedans, sports cars, SUVs and others. Go for a drive or unleash your weapon and cause mayhem across the city. You own this town! Be sure to view the controls when running the game to know how to play.

-A fully open 2D sprite-based world.
-Cities, beaches, deserts and other explorable areas.
-Hijack and drive vehicles, from sedans, sports cars, SUVs and more.

item.title: PARASiTE FLOWER
item.description:
About This Game

PARASiTE FLOWER is a beautiful yet disturbing side scroller game where you slowly uncover the story of Ari.
A short disturbing horror game where you're playing as Ari Yeong, she is re-living the same day over and over again. With each loop the world around her get's darker and more dangerous. Choose the right options to keep her alive and get her to class.

SPACE to Interact

F4 for Full-screen



BUGS

INSPIRATION

item.title: Charrua Soccer - Mirror Edition
item.description:
About This Game


This is CHARRUA SOCCER!, with the same action and adrenaline that you already know from the Pro Edition, in this edition, you can face other players in Mirror Online matches!
Mirror Online? yes! this is something new in football games… two simultaneous matches, one overall score! Control your local team and direct your remote team. The combined goals decide the winner!

A ranked game mode, in which while you directly control your local team, another version of your team, playing as the visitor, faces the opponent on the remote PC, following the strategy you define in advance. Both players will be aware of what happens in the remote match, even being able to view the replays of the best moments from each game.



Create and lead your team to glory, competing in ranked mode or playing with friends.
You can face your rivals alone or if you wish, you can even invite friends to play on the same team, a feature available by connecting locally or through Steam Remote Together.

Mirror Online:


  • An original mode- a new way to play and compete against remote opponents.
  • Two Matches Simultaneously- Home and away games, with remote match event alerts!
  • Control your home team- you face the rival team under the direction of your opponent.
  • Manage your remote team- with your direction, your team will play against the rival.
  • Evolve your team- by playing you will get XP to improve your stats.
  • Ranked Leagues- start at the bottom and lead your team to compete among the best.
  • Ranked Matches- find an opponent with similar skills to play mirror online.
  • Friendly Matches- play Mirror Online matches against a friend.
  • Cooperative Matches- invite your friends to join your team to face rivals. The connection of these friends can be local or through Remote Play Together.

Store:


Earn coins as you play to buy cool items in the store, like custom balls, flags, stadiums, and player cosmetics – think unique hairdos to dog costumes. The possibilities are endless!

Link with the PRO Edition:


Those who already own or plan to purchase the Pro Edition will also benefit from accessing their thematic items, stadiums, balls, etc., in Mirror Edition as well.
The Mirror and Pro versions are linked, the coins earned in both editions are unified, as are the items purchased in either store. That is, if you need coins for an item that you want to buy in the Mirror store, you can also collect coins by playing the various game modes available in the Pro edition.

Features:


  • Intuitive yet challenging gameplay, perfect for all skill levels.
  • Dual control modes cater to both casual and seasoned players.
  • Customizable assistance – turn it on for help or off for a tougher challenge.
  • Realistic soccer elements: fouls, cards, injuries, penalties.

  • Options for women's, men's, and mixed teams.
  • Variety of moves: passes, shots, and specialty skills like Chilean kicks.
  • In-depth team management: formation, strategy, substitutions, and more.



The Mirror Edition promises endless entertainment!
Are you prepared to challenge friends or fight for the title of ultimate champion?

item.title: Apocalypse Love Shelter
item.description:
About This Game

This is a post-apocalyptic adventure/base building game with real actors. You take on the role of a military aficionada who, purely as a hobby, built an entire refugee safehouse. Who would’ve thought that an apocalypse would actually strike? Now, this simple shelter will survive as the first and final line of defense between you and the teeming swarms of zombies.

Game features:

·[Pregame: Prior to the apocalypse arriving, you use your personal cash to build up your shelter and perfect it.]


·[Arrival: Some people who knew of your hobbies, such as a friend, a coworker, or a neighbor all attempt to enter the shelter. You can choose whether to let them in or not.】


·[Shelter Management: Once you’ve built up a team, you need to decide on the best way to allocate food, water, and other resources.]


·[Poor Management: Your team will suffer both physically and mentally if you make poor choices – and they may even fall into the eternal slumber of night.】


·[Night Events: If you don’t have enough food, everyone’s condition will drastically deteriorate, resulting in all sorts of nighttime events.】


·[Affinity & Sidequests: Set your gaze beyond the confines of your shelter. Certain decisions you make in the post-apocalyptic streets will also have a major impact. 】

item.title: SINGULARIUM
item.description:
About This Game

Zoom through levels at mach speeds!

At its very core, SINGULARIUM is a game about speed. It's a Fast-Paced 3D platformer, that has you using the various movement mechanics to their fullest, such as wallrunning, bunny hopping, and your ability to create black holes that pull you around, to try to beat each level with a fast time.

Features:

  • Black Hole Physics - moving while being pulled will allow you to curve around your black hole, adding a ton of complexity and enriching the movement system for those skilled enough to master it.
  • Hardcore Gameplay - Quick reactions will be vital if you want to beat these levels while going at breakneck speeds!
  • Tons of Levels - SINGUALRIUM has 20+ handcrafted levels, with more to come!
  • Level Editor - Create and share your own custom levels!
  • Complex Movement System - combining wallrunning, walljumping, swinging, and bunny hopping will allow you to zoom through the levels
  • Builtin Level Timers - Compare your level times with your friends!

item.title: Number Shoot VR
item.description:
About This Game

Number Shoot VR is a gun shooting VR game that you destroy approaching targets and use the enhancements and weapons you gain to score more points.
The six available weapons have different characteristics, and by using the right weapon you can destroy targets more efficiently.

Play time per session is 4 minutes!
Destroy targets at all costs and aim for a high score!

Destroy Targets!

Shoot targets with your weapon anyway! Destroy as many targets as you can and aim for a high score!
The choice of weapon enhancement is the key to a high score.

Destroy targets, enhance weapons!

Enhancement system is introduced for weapons. Destroying a target will enhance the weapon.
Your Weapon will be enhanced Depending on the color of the destroyed target.
　(Red) Firepower
　(Purple) Rate of fire
　(Blue) Magazine ammunition number
　(Green) accuracy.

Wipe out targets with explosions!

Explosive weapons or black targets (bombs) can collectively damage a target!
but If you destroy a target with a lot of penalty targets ... around it...!

VRM avatar support!

Unity-Chan VRM avatars are available by built-in!
In addition, external VRM avatars can be loaded from a file!

item.title: Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys
item.description:
About This Game

Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.
Your goal is to assemble a picture of cute monkeys that has been cut into an equal number of pieces.
Rotate the pieces to create the full picture, but think logically about the connections and solve the puzzle.
There are 50 levels to complete, and the challenge becomes increasingly difficult as you progress.
Enjoy a relaxing time connecting the pieces to create a beautiful picture of monkeys

In Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys:

•50 levels
•Beautiful art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music

item.title: Clean City Project
item.description:
About This Game

Collect, shoot, destroy and collect again.
This is a decontamination shooter game that you can play without worrying about time.

An experimental city floating on the sea has suddenly turned purple due to a pollution accident.
The player takes on the role of Lavilitta, a rabbit-shaped cleaning robot,
Can you clean up the polluted city and restore the beautiful white city?

The player has two objectives

Fill all 8 purification facilities with scattered "energy gems".
To remove all pollution.


To strengthen the player with the batteries found in each location,
and collect and remove them more efficiently!

The Story

A pollution accident has occurred in the experimental city of Alpha.
A large amount of dangerous purple pollutants have been generated and have covered the city.
All residents appear to have been safely evacuated.
In order to restore the city, it is necessary to recover the energy scattered throughout the city and fill all eight purification facilities.
However, the facilities have been shut down and the damage will only continue to grow.
To solve this problem, the cleaning robot "Lavilitta" was dispatched to remove the contaminants.
It is equipped with a vacuum cleaner with powerful suction and a special filter.
And it should be able to destroy contamination by sending energy bullets.
To reclaim the city, Lavilitta is going to work!

item.title: PRIN-C1
item.description:
About This Game

An Endless runner with a twist! Play as a dog named PRIN-C1 who can walk, trot and run but cannot stop.

Go Slow. Go Fast. Speed is your choice


Switch views seamlessly


Collect treats. If not.. steal them


Smash them or get punched


Unlock fun costumes by completing score challenges

item.title: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy
item.description:
About This Game




Living in a fantasy world, it's always been your dream to grow up to be a famous adventurer just like your father. Reality proves to be more boring than fiction, however, as your days are mostly spent doing odd jobs for the villagers. With your friends by your side, you enter the Tournament of the Eights and strive for something greater: the chance to become the top guild in the country. Will you realize your ambitions, or will your hopes slip through your fingers and doom you to a life of monochrome monotony?


As a member of your town's Adventurers' Guild, it's your job to protect the townsfolk. Go on hunts, kill dangerous beasts, and hone your abilities to better tackle whatever challenges tomorrow brings.

Once you get home from work, you'll have your sister to attend to. She's a very sickly girl who needs a lot of help. Manage your household finances well, build up your relationship with your sister, and who knows, perhaps you might even be able to solve the mystery behind her illness.











Hand-Drawn Monochrome Art
Though it may lack color, this game's world is anything but colorless! The stunning black-and-white art is chock-full of personality and is sure to leave you with plenty of marvelous monochrome memories!

Unique Combat System
With tons of bizarre and ferocious monsters to fight and dozens of unique skills to unlock, your adventures are sure to be full of challenge and excitement!

Charming Characters
Build up your relationships with your guildmates and your sister to learn about what makes them tick and unlock character-specific abilities to further assist you in your quest to become the top guild in the country!

item.title: Part of You
item.description:
About This Game

Well shucks, you’ve lost your identity! It’s somewhere in Hacksaw Springs, and everything is pointing you toward the Lost and Found inside… a… Clown Convention?

Tools

In Part of You, you will have to use a variety of tools in order to solve problems around Hacksaw Springs. Some of the tools you’ll be using include:

  • The Flipper: The flipper will turn any facial feature upside down. Need somebody to look away? Turn their frown upside down? Make someone look a little goofy, generally speaking? The flipper is for you!

  • The Stamp: Ever needed someone to have a different person’s mouth? Eyes? … you have? Huh, that’s weird. With the stamp, you can clone facial features and put them onto other people! Want to make someone look like someone else? Make Millard Morawn a chad? Make a clone army? The stamp has you covered!

  • The Mask: Missing your own identity? No problem – just steal someone else’s! Fraud isn’t real, and nobody will come after you. It may not be the best disguise, but… people love talking to familiar faces.

  • Googly Eyes: Have you ever taken a pair of googly eyes and put them on your eyelids, trying to balance them and pretend they’re your own eyes? Now you can forcibly stick them onto someone else’s eyes!

    Hacksaw Springs


    Hacksaw Springs is usually a bit of a snoozefest – your average town, your average drama. Now that Funny Business is renting out the convention center for Clown Around 20XX, things have been pretty hectic! The Flea Market is as busy as ever, with new stalls popping up. The Parking Lot is filled with pop-up shops and protests. To top it all off, the incompetent town security is more preoccupied with googly eyes than A BOMB!

    Characters

    Over 100 unique characters fill the streets (and roofs?) of Hacksaw Springs. Help out the friendly townsfolk, and they might just help you in return! A dedicated employee of a three-years-defunct video store, a noseless mechanic in love with his goil, a tumbleweed with a warrant? All that and more as you rediscover who you are…

    Need a Little Funny HaHa?

    The more you play, the more characters you’ll gain access to! Have a field day making the funniest faces Hacksaw Springs has to offer!

    Finding your Identity

    Part of You is all about finding your identity, as well as us finding ours. This is a game about the absurdity of the world and the silliness we all face every morning when we look at ourselves in the mirror. Part of You and Hacksaw Springs welcomes you, no matter who you are… as long as you don’t have coulrophobia.

item.title: REDACTED
item.description:
About This Game

REDACTED is an action-packed zombie survival game with an emphasis on narrative, unique gameplay experiences, and atmosphere. Anything not nailed down can be used to your advantage as you survive against the zombie horde in this mysterious facility. Check out the merchant to stock up on supplies or buy new weapons. Survive for as long as you can against increasingly difficult waves of undead in survival mode. Try out onslaught mode if you want to test yourself against the ultimate challenge.

item.title: Snip It!
item.description:
About This Game

Snip It! is a line-drawing arcade puzzle game inspired by games like Qix. Your goal is to capture parts of the canvas by drawing shapes and avoiding the enemies. Complete all 25 levels to win!

Controls: WASD/arrow keys or click/touch to navigate & move, ESC to pause, M to mute.

item.title: Essence Bloom
item.description:
About This Game

"I will show you a path to happiness."

Essence Bloom is a linear story-focused Visual Novel that is centered around the MC (the player) living in a peaceful world where he spends time with friends:

Hikari - Aka, "The Sunshine Girl," is always smiling and happy. In fact, she seems obsessed with it and wants everyone else to be as happy as she is.

Yuna - She runs the coffee shop, is number one in her class, and still finds time to take care of her younger sister, Saeko. She's bossy and blunt, but she has a gentle heart deep down.

Saeko - She is the opposite of her older sister, Yuna, in almost every way. She's clumsy, timid, and very reliant. She also seems confused most of the time and worries everyone, but she is well loved. 

Kagome - She's a well-disciplined martial arts champion who will defend anyone she cares about, no matter the sacrifice. She can also, surprisingly, be a bit bashful.

The friends spend their time in school studying, working at their local coffee shop, and doing fun activities. Everything is peaceful until things start to happen that threaten the serenity of this world...

Features: A story-rich experience with aesthetic visuals, energetic characters, and ~4 hours of dialogue. 

This game is meant for 18+ audiences. Some viewers may find the content disturbing or offensive.
